column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) weighted in T2, revealing the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°131 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 7.9102 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 68.5547 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1103.4668 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 92.2852 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 990.0879 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 7933.8867 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 296.6309 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 104.1504 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1798.2422 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 322.9980 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 261.0352 mm³ there.
